__e: How am I suddenly such a threat, unless I'm--
I'm tired of living every day under the threat of death.
Wouldn't be much of a threat if you knew who he was, would he, Bob?
- You're not a threat to me.
Do you really think a child like this poses any threat to me?
You probably think you're on this trip because you're some kind of contender, some-- some threat to me.
Fears you haven't come back and that what I see is just another threat to all of us.
But she's my friend. She's one of us now. And she's no threat to us.
I just think he poses a greater threat to all of us.
You probably think you're on this trip because you're some kind of contender, some-- some threat to me.
A woman with a baby, and I was that threatening to them.
But she's my friend. She's one of us now. And she's no threat to us.
They're a menace to themselves and us.
She's still a threat to herself.
If they don't do that, you know you're not getting to them.
I would appreciate it if you would stop using my people and my country as a source for every threat levelled at the United States.
And this is a new threat the government could really have done without, Frank?
As you can imagine, the treat of it doesn't sit well with those of us that remain.
Fleeing from a threat and putting that over his children and family.
The people are no threat. They should be left alone.
These people are a threat, and if you shoot me, you'll never know how great a threat they were, because I know what they're doing here.
Well, it's odd in that it's, um, certainly very considered a threat, but if they really wanted to harm you, why are they telling you about it?
Look, I-I want us to be friends because then you won't feel like a threat, but mostly... Because listening to the way Christopher talks about you made me realize I'd be lucky to be your friend.
You may not be a threat but you better stop pretending to be a hero.
